title: Vlogging
description: Pictures are great, but I love capturing the context behind each frame. Even though some of my friends are camera shy in the moment, they always appreciate being able to revisit these time-capsuled memories!

title: Calisthenics
description: From being too weak to do a single pull-up to completing 100 for the Murph, I discovered my love for training through bodyweight fitness rather than lifting weights. Now I’m working towards more advanced skills!

title: Running
description: I never thought I’d voluntarily run, but ever since I said "If you sign up, I will too," participating in races has been addicting. Even just training for one has become meditative!

title: Bouldering
description: There’s something about climbing that makes you feel like a kid again. I love the social aspect of climbing with friends, and the community is so friendly!

title: Cooking
description: I enjoy learning new recipes and especially cooking for others. It's so satisfying when my guests want a second plate. I am currently working on a cookbook of all my favorite foods!
